description: This table extracts the related multiple response Job Action Parameters (I HLR 272) item.

columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the request record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HL_ACTION_PARAM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The parameters specified for the corresponding action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Bed Status


Print TTR Location Type


Confirmation Record


Exclusion Rules


Plan To Same Technician Rule


Print TTR Location


Print TTR Number of Copies


Print TTR Inclusion Rule
